Uses of Interface
org.cooperari.feature.CFeature

  • Packages that use CFeature 
    Package Description
    org.cooperari.feature
    Root package for feature implementations.
    org.cooperari.feature.atomic
    Yields points for methods in java.util.concurrent.AtomicXXX classes.
    org.cooperari.feature.data
    Support for data access yield points and race detection.
    org.cooperari.feature.hotspots
    Hotspot reachability feature.
    org.cooperari.feature.monitor
    Yield point support for Java monitor operations and related deadlock detection.
    org.cooperari.feature.thread
    Yield point support Thread life-cycle methods.
    org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner
    Support for the "fork-and-join" thread runner.
    org.cooperari.feature.unsafe
    Support for yield points in calls to methods to sun.misc.Unsafe.

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature

      Methods in org.cooperari.feature that return types with arguments of type CFeature 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static List<CFeature> CAllFeatures.getFeatures()
      Get list of all features.

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature.atomic

      Classes in org.cooperari.feature.atomic that implement CFeature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CAtomicObjectsFeature
      Feature handler for yield points defined by calls to methods in the java.util.concurrent.atomic package.

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature.data

      Classes in org.cooperari.feature.data that implement CFeature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CDataAccessFeature
      Handler for data access yield points.

      Hotspot reachibility feature.

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature.monitor

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature.thread

      Thread life-cycle yield points feature.

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner

      Classes in org.cooperari.feature.threadrunner that implement CFeature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CThreadRunnerFeature
      Thread runner feature (support for CSystem.forkAndJoin(java.lang.Runnable...)).

    • Uses of CFeature in org.cooperari.feature.unsafe

      Classes in org.cooperari.feature.unsafe that implement CFeature 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CSunMiscUnsafeFeature
      Feature handler for yield points defined by calls to methods in the sun.misc.Unsafe class.
